summary: Full Stack Software Engineer with 4+ years of experience developing high-performance web applications with Python, Django, and modern frontend frameworks. Specialist in AI-enhanced applications with deep expertise in Python, JavaScript, and TypeScript. Advanced proficiency in React and Vue.js for complex UI development and rapid prototyping. Ranked in top 2.5% on LeetCode, demonstrating exceptional algorithmic problem-solving abilities. Passionate about applying AI techniques to create innovative user experiences. Open to global opportunities.

details: GPA: 3.79, Top 4% of class.

items.institution: ICPC Africa Regional Finals | Competitive Programming
details: Mastered advanced data structures and algorithms in Python and JavaScript, building robust, efficient software solutions.
Achieved Top 2.5% LeetCode ranking by solving over 1,000 algorithmic challenges, showcasing deep language proficiency and problem-solving skills.

items.role: OwlBox AI | Full Stack Software Engineer
details: Architected Python backend services using Django and FastAPI to integrate computer vision and machine learning models.
Engineered an AI-driven video annotation platform frontend with React and Redux, improving user responsiveness by 30%.
Implemented complex state management and optimized component rendering with React hooks, reducing load times by 25%.
Developed custom AI processing pipelines to handle video data analysis and automated annotation suggestions.
Built Floey's interactive frontend using Vue.js and TypeScript, implementing real-time notifications that increased user engagement by 25%.
Developed Floey's backend with Django REST Framework, creating a recommendation engine using Python's scikit-learn.
Created a separate restaurant management dashboard with Vue.js and Vuex, demonstrating versatility across frontend frameworks.
Optimized database queries and implemented caching strategies, improving API response times by 40%.
Developed Superstars.co's Backend Python, Django, and JavaScript, processing data with NumPy and Pandas.
Built interactive data visualization components with React, providing insights into user behavior patterns.
Reduced application loading time by 30% through code optimization and frontend performance improvements.
Architected a scalable backend with Python, Django, and PostgreSQL, handling 10,000+ daily transactions.
Implemented machine learning algorithms to detect fraudulent transactions, reducing fraud cases by 25%.
Designed RESTful APIs with Django REST Framework, enabling seamless integration with mobile applications.
Created comprehensive test coverage with pytest, ensuring 95% code reliability.
Developed the frontend with React, implementing dynamic search filters and rating components.
Created a content management system for restaurant owners using Vue.js for its simplicity and rapid development.
Built a recommendation engine using Python's scikit-learn and pandas to suggest restaurants based on user preferences.
Implemented real-time notifications for reviews using Django Channels and WebSockets.
Ranked in the top 2.5% on LeetCode, demonstrating exceptional problem-solving abilities in Python.
Won $1,000 in ICPC Month-Long Coding Competition, exhibiting dedication and coding excellence.
Contributed to open-source Python Projects
